content: ü§ñ AI is everywhere ‚Äî but how well do we actually understand it?From smart assistants to automation at work, we interact with "AI" constantly, but many people still believe myths like:"AI is the same as automation""AI means robots are taking over""AI can think and feel like humans"These misconceptions aren't just innocent ‚Äî they affect how we adopt, regulate, and trust the technology.In this post, I break down:‚úÖ What AI is‚ùå What AI is notüí° Why human involvement is still essentialMy goal isn‚Äôt to hype AI, but to help people understand it better.
